page.title: 17ASHPERTON : NEW SETTLERS
page.content: All families in this development have been in the village between 3 and 4 years. Coming from Birmingham and the West Midlands mainly, with some from London, the North of England and South Wales. There is an average of one person employed in each household in work ranging across electronic engineer designer, teacher and builder. Every household has the use of a car _ in fact 1.6 cars per household. They travel up to a radius of twenty miles around the village. They use Ledbury as a market town but the trend is to by_pass Ledbury and use Hereford. In looking at ages, it was found that a third of the people were in the oldest age group. This is partly because the price of these new houses has put them out of the reach of many younger families.
